text:
The Accounting Directive Article 29b(1) third subparagraph point (ii) of Directive 2013/34/EU
states: ‘In the delegated acts referred to in the first subparagraph the Commission shall, by 30
June 2024, specify: . . . (ii) information that undertakings are to report that is specific to the sector
in which they operate.’
Answer
The ESRS Sectors will be defined in a future delegated act, following the issuance of a draft ESRS
to be prepared by EFRAG.
